name: Chili Con Carne
steps: Brown ground beef in a large pot
Add chopped onions and garlic, sauté until translucent
Stir in bell peppers and cook until soft
Add canned tomatoes, kidney beans, and chili powder
Simmer for 30 minutes, stirring occasionally
Serve with rice or crusty bread
description: A hearty and spicy dish made with ground beef and beans.

name: Lemon Herb Roasted Chicken
steps: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C)
Mix olive oil, lemon juice, garlic, and herbs in a bowl
Rub the mixture all over the chicken, including under the skin
Place chicken in a roasting pan and season with salt and pepper
Roast for about 1.5 hours, or until internal temperature reaches 165°F (74°C)
Let rest before carving
description: Juicy roasted chicken flavored with fresh herbs and lemon.

name: Vegetable Stir Fry
steps: Chop your choice of vegetables (e.g., bell peppers, broccoli, carrots)
Heat oil in a skillet or wok over high heat
Add vegetables and stir-fry for 5-7 minutes until tender-crisp
Add soy sauce and sesame oil, cooking for another minute
Serve hot with rice or noodles
description: A colorful and healthy mix of stir-fried vegetables.

name: Beef Stroganoff
steps: Slice beef into thin strips and brown in a skillet
Remove beef and sauté onions and mushrooms in the same skillet
Stir in beef broth and let simmer for 10 minutes
Mix in sour cream and return beef to the skillet
Serve over egg noodles or rice
description: A rich and creamy dish featuring tender beef and mushrooms.

name: Pesto Pasta
steps: Cook pasta according to package instructions
While pasta is cooking, blend basil, garlic, pine nuts, and Parmesan cheese with olive oil
Drain pasta and mix with pesto sauce
Season with salt and pepper, serve with extra Parmesan on top
description: A simple yet flavorful pasta dish with fresh pesto sauce.

name: Mushroom Risotto
steps: Heat broth and keep it warm in a separate pot
Sauté onions in olive oil until translucent, then add garlic
Stir in Arborio rice and toast for 1-2 minutes
Gradually add warm broth, one ladle at a time, stirring constantly
Add sautéed mushrooms and continue until rice is creamy and tender
Finish with butter and Parmesan cheese
description: A creamy Italian rice dish enriched with mushrooms.

name: Stuffed Bell Peppers
steps: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C)
Cut tops off bell peppers and remove seeds
In a bowl, mix cooked rice, ground meat, tomatoes, and spices
Stuff the mixture into the bell peppers
Arrange peppers in a baking dish and top with cheese
Bake for 30-35 minutes until peppers are tender
description: Bell peppers filled with a savory mixture of rice and meat.

name: Banana Oatmeal Cookies
steps: Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C)
In a bowl, mash ripe bananas and mix with oats, cinnamon, and chocolate chips
Scoop the mixture onto a baking sheet lined with parchment paper
Bake for 12-15 minutes until golden brown
Let cool before serving
description: Soft and chewy cookies made with bananas and oats.

name: Fish Tacos
steps: Season fish fillets with lime juice, cumin, and chili powder
Grill or pan-fry the fish until cooked through
Warm tortillas in a pan or oven
Assemble tacos with fish, slaw, avocado, and salsa
Serve with lime wedges
description: Soft tortillas filled with grilled fish and fresh toppings.
